Params: {3: 'The Gray Raven squad arrives at an abandoned subway station with its roof destroyed.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Lee, I'm going to put you down now. Please wait a moment while I heal you!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Lee, hang in there, we'll be able to go back soon!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A figure emerges from the broken ruins.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'm Chrome, the leader of Strike Hawk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "HQ sent me here to pick you guys up, I'll arrange for the transport aircraft to take you to the nearest base for maintenance.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "It's alright, I'll take care of him.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Gray Raven squad, together with Chrome supporting Lee, finally made it back to the surface.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Now that the biggest obstacle in the area has been eliminated, we humans can finally build a new base here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Members of Strike Hawk are usually deployed all over the world and work individually, and our most urgent mission now is to find out all we can about the "Ascendants".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'As far as I know, the Ascendants already withdrew from this area before this mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'And the Ascendants were the ones who created Iron Maiden. This unknown power is still a threat to us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'm afraid we'll find ourselves in a much more difficult position soon...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Gray Raven boards the transport craft. On board, there is a female Construct covered in injuries.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Look at you, Lee, you've seen better days.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Uh huh? Let me return the favor and tell you that you've seen far better days.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The transport aircraft takes off, finally taking Gray Raven away from the streets of City 015.'}
{3: 'Steady footsteps can be heard from a cave hidden by the sand, leading to the inside of the subway station.'}
{3: 'A petite figure emerges from the darkness...'}
{2: '???', 3: 'The day we meet again will come.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'And that sister will come back to me again...'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Let\'s welcome the coming of the "dawn" together...'}
